start: Hello, I am MERC's Harvey Bot. I am not that Harvey who used to work at Chicago Mercantile Exchange but I will try to be useful.
start_about: I will look for some information of your symbols in my database.
refuse_about: I found your symbol but can't tell you any interesting information about it.
error_about: I am sorry but I couldn't find that symbol.
start_check: I am ready to receive your favourites symbols. I will try to check its last price.
info_check: I am going to check the Invertir Online website. Note that I will wait between 2 and 5 seconds to execute each query.
error_check: I couldn't find that symbol. Please check it.
set_list_1: Let's set a new watchlist. You are going to send me your prefered symbols. I will check if I find them.
set_list_2: Please, send me first your favourites symbols of the Bolsa de Comercio de Buenos Aires. Send me OK when you are done.
set_list_3: Now you can send me your favourites symbols of the rest of the world. Send me OK when you are done.
set_list_4: Your watchlist is ready. Send me /list to check it.
error_set_list: I didn't found that symbol in my database so I didn't add it to your watchlist. Send me the next one...
start_list: This will take a while. I am looking for your favourites symbols last data on Invertir Online website.
error_list: You don't have a saved watchlist at the moment. Try to set one sending me /setlist.
language2: Note that this bot does not store any persistent data from you. If the bot is restarted it will be forget your preference. In that case, be patient and send /language again.
language3: I will try speak en english now...
submit_error_1: Please tell me which command the error you are reporting is related to.
submit_error_2: Tell me briefly what the error you found is about.
submit_error_3: Thank you so much for taking a minute to make me better. Hopefully @rvalla will fix me soon.
intruder: This is a secret command. You are not authorized to use it.
